messages.message:
Samantha
Okay, first off SORRY to everyone who got a horribly offensive wall post from me. I received the same one from a friend of mine and tried to remove it - when I did that it spammed EVERYONE on my friends list...I really would hope that my friends and acquaintances would know that I would never say anything so cruel...so agian, I apologize.
Becca Holman Williams left the group.
